works.description:
I am a professional writer who wrote a  
manuscript entitled Fools,For Christ's Sake, based on my own experiences  
with a deviant priest. I had an assistant who provided material for the  
book but I was the only writer of the book. I have had legal advice and  
this verifies that I own the the copyright. My lawyers, Finlaysons of  
Adelaide are compiling a case for legal action to support this. I own the 

copyright of this book under The Copyright Act of 1968, Australia.
